about_the_game:
Modern Warfare Camo Pack


Introducing Vehicle Modern Warfare Camo Pack. showcasing cutting-edge warfare aesthetics. Enhance your CERC vehicles with a range of modern American-inspired camo options, including urban combat for metropolitan warfare, modern American UCP camo, and black elite for a stealthy edge.

Choose from:
  • Elite Black Camo
  • Blue Urban Night Digital Camo
  • UCP Modern Camo

This pack enables the application of your selected camouflage to all CERC vehicles individually as you build each unit in the game. You have the flexibility to choose the type of camo for each vehicle during its construction. Camos can also be changed at any time by bringing any vehicle to the CERC Motor Pool and using the Weapon Customization UI.

We always appreciate hearing from our community and supporters. Thus, if you have any suggestions for camouflage designs that you'd love to see integrated into the game as downloadable content, we encourage you to share them with us via our Camo Request Poll.

Cepheus Protocol – Camo DLC


As Cepheus Protocol remains in its Early Access phase, your purchase of this vehicle camouflage pack plays a crucial role in supporting the ongoing development of the game. Without the backing of dedicated supporters like yourself, we would not be able to continue improving and bringing the game closer to its completion.

Since day one, we have prioritized listening to our community and striving to fulfill their desires. In fact, it was the overwhelming response from our fans in a recent poll that prompted us to start working on DLC content for Cepheus Protocol. Every penny generated from the DLC content directly contributes to the further development of Cepheus Protocol. As a small indie team with only a few developers, we truly appreciate all the support you have provided us.
